title: What would be the best way to improve content on my videos? - Quora

response.answer_text: Is that your channel I mean really it you who made this ? Whose voice was it auto matic from text to speech ? First of all I’ve not been into gaming niche or comic niche as of now so I really can’t help you with the content because I have not seen your competitors but yeah you want to grow this or have some plan you can please let me know more about this. This is not a common niche after all!
